pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Antonio Tajani, President of the European Parliament | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Antonio Tajani, President of the European Parliament.

Prime Minister Trudeau congratulated President Tajani on his recent election as the President of the European Parliament.   The two leaders underscored the strong partnership between Canada and the European Union and affirmed their desire to further strengthen the relationship.  

They also reiterated their commitment to ratifying and implementing the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) as quickly as possible for the mutual benefit of both Canada and the European Union. President Tajani invited Prime Minister Trudeau to address the European Parliament on February 16, which Prime Minister Trudeau accepted.
